text.農家のおじちゃんが\r\nまた、にんじんくれたんだー。\r\nあとであげるねっ！: The farmer gave me some carrots again. I'll give them to you later!
text.トレーナーとの約束、\r\n絶対守るよっ！\r\n一緒に1着、たくさんとろうね！: I'll keep my promise to my trainer! Let's get a lot of clothes together!
text.ねーねー、雑誌の特集見たっ？\r\nわたし、“勇気をもらえるウマ娘”\r\nなん: Hey, hey, did you see the magazine feature? I'm the "horsegirl Who Gives You Courage"! Oh, my gosh!
text.トレーナーも羽根突きやろー？\r\nお顔まっくろになるの、\r\n楽しいよー！: Trainers, do you want to do the shuttlecock? It's fun to make your face black!
text.チョコ、みんなで作ったんだー。\r\n味見係だったから、お腹いっぱい\r\n食べ: We all made chocolate together. I was in charge of tasting, so I was able to eat a full meal.
text.トレーナーと会ってからおもしろい\r\nこといっぱいだよ！だからチョコも\r\n: Since I met my trainer, things have been really interesting! That's why I bought so many chocolates!
text.天の川を走ったら、\r\n気持ちよさそうだよねー。\r\nお空の上でレースしたー: It would be so nice to run along the Milky Way! I want to race in the sky!
text.トリック・オア・トリート！\r\nお菓子とにんじんくれなきゃ\r\nいたずらしち: Trick or treat! Give me candy and carrots or I'll trick you!
text.おっきな靴下飾りましょ～♪\r\nにんじん山盛りもらいましょ～♪\r\n…大きさ: Let's decorate our big socks… Let's get a big pile of carrots… …big enough? About my size!
text.ふぉっふぉっふぉ！よい子の\r\nトレーナーには、あとでウララ\r\nサンタから: Whoo-hoo-hoo! Urara Santa has a present for all good trainers later.
text.おっそーじ、おっそーじー♪\r\n早く終わらせて、年越しそば\r\n食べようねー: Cleaning Clea~ning♪ Let's finish early and eat New Year's Eve soba noodles!
text.ハッピーバースデー♪みんなで\r\nパーティーの準備したんだよ！\r\n一緒にお: Happy Birthday… we've prepared a party for you! Let's celebrate together!
text.お誕生日、お祝いしに行こっ？\r\nにんじんがおいしいお店、\r\nいっぱい見つ: Let's go celebrate your birthday, shall we? I've found lots of great places to eat carrots!
text.オトナになったから、びゅんって\r\n速くなっちゃったかな！？\r\nタイム計っ: Now that I'm an adult, I've become a lot faster! Let's see your time!
text.プレゼントくれるの！？やったー！\r\nトレーナーだーいすきー♪えへへ、\r\n: You're giving me a present! Yay! I love trainers… hehehe, I wish every day was my birthday…
text.なんか、お知らせきてるみたい！\r\n気になる気になる～！: I think they've got some kind of announcement! I'm curious, I'm curious～!
text.わぁ～、プレゼントだって！\r\nにんじんかな？\r\nにんじんだといいなっ♪: Wow, she said it's a present! Is it a carrot? I hope it's a carrot!
text.ミッションクリアー♪\r\nごほうびもらいにいこうよ、\r\nトレーナー！: Mission accomplished! Let's go get our reward, trainer!
text.イベント準備中だってー。\r\n今からワクワクするね！: They are preparing for the event. Now that's exciting!
text.おもしろそうなイベントだねっ。\r\n早く見に行こうよ、トレーナー！: Sounds like an interesting event. Can't wait to see it, trainer!
text.うーん…なんか、へろへろかもー。\r\n力が出ないよー…。: Hmmm… I'm feeling a little weak… I can't find my strength…
text.なんだろー…？すっごく眠くて、\r\n力が抜けて…ふぁ…。: I wonder…? I feel so sleepy and weak…
text.今のウララは、\r\nスーパーウララなんだよっ！\r\nすっごく調子いいんだから: Now Urara is super-Urara! She's doing great!
text.うっらら～♪\r\nやる気満タン、絶好調だよっ！: I'm full of motivation, I'm on a roll!
text.おっけー！ウララはやるよー！\r\n見ててねっ♪: Ok! Urara will do it! Watch me!
text.ぴょんぴょん♪なんか、鳥さん\r\nみたいに体が軽いんだー。: ♪ Jump, jump, jump… ♪ My body is light like a bird.
text.どんなメニューをやるの？\r\n教えて～！: What kind of menu do you do? Tell me!
text.やるならおもしろい練習がいいな。\r\nそういうのあるー？: I'd like to do some interesting exercises. Do you have such a thing?
text.あうぅ～…トレーニングは\r\n大事だもんねっ。\r\n大丈夫だよ、がんばれるよ: Training is important, right? Don't worry, you can do it!
text.わたしのやる気、迷子みたい。\r\n一緒に探してくれる？: My motivation seems to be lost. Will you look for it with me?
text.わたし、元気だよ！\r\nけどね、お耳としっぽがずっと\r\nへにゃーってしてる: I'm fine! But, my ears and tail are always twitching…
text.お休みしたり遊んだりするのって、\r\nトレーニングにならないかなぁ？: I wonder if it's not good training to take a day off and play?
text.よぉーし、またレースだー…。\r\n…が、がんばるぞぉ～…。: Alright, another race…………………… I'll do my best…
text.あのね、レースいっぱいで\r\nうれしいんだけどね、体が\r\nずしーんって重い: You know, I'm so happy to see so many races, but my body is so heavy… ugh…
text.見ててね、トレーナー！\r\nばびゅーんと1着、\r\nとってきちゃうからっ！: Watch out for my sweatshirt! I'm going to get you one of those sweatshirts!
text.にんじんたくさん食べたから、\r\nすっごく調子いいんだー。\r\nよーし、1着: I ate a lot of carrots, so I'm feeling really good. All right, I'm going to win the first place!
text.始まる前から、うらら～な感じ♪\r\n勝ったら、にんじんプリンでお祝い\r\nし: I'm feeling enraptured even before the game starts… If we win, let's celebrate with carrot pudding!
text.たくさんトレーニングしたし、\r\n調子オッケーだもん！\r\nこのレース、勝て: I've trained hard and I'm in great shape! I'm sure I can win this race.
text.この調子なら、いけるかもっ！\r\nレースまだかな？\r\n早くいっぱい走りたー: At this rate, I might just make it! I can't wait for the race! I can't wait to run a lot!
text.わたしはいつも通りだよ！\r\n前よりいい成績残すぞー！: I'm the same as always! I'll do better than before!
text.いつもみたく楽しんで\r\n走ってくるね、トレーナー！: Have fun running like you always do, trainer!
text.今まで通りに走ればいいんだよね！\r\n大丈夫だよっ！: Just keep running the way you've been running! It's all right!
text.いっしょうけんめい走れば、きっと\r\nいい結果になるよー。\r\n心配しないで: If you run as hard as you can, I'm sure you'll do great! Don't worry, trainer!
text.楽しいこと思い出して、\r\nうらら～な気分になるぞー！\r\nなれなれー！: I'm going to remember all the fun things I've done, and I'm going to be so envious! Be happy!
text.調子悪くても、トレーナーと\r\n一緒なら勝てるよね！\r\n最後までがんばるよ: Even if I'm in bad shape, with my trainer we can win! I'll try my best until the end!
text.なんだろ…変な感じー。\r\n緊張はしてないんだけど、\r\nうーん。: I don't know… I feel weird. I'm not nervous, but…
text.むー…レースが始まれば、\r\n楽しく走れるよねっ。うん！: Mmm… once the race starts, we can have some fun, right? Yup!
text.トレーナー、お菓子持ってる？\r\n甘いもの食べたら元気出るかも…。: Trainer, do you have any snacks? Maybe something sweet would cheer you up…
text.海行くのっ？: Are you going to the beach?
text.やったやったー！2着だよー！: Yay yay yay, I'm in second place!
text.みんな強いねー。次は負けないぞ～！: You guys are so strong! We won't lose next time～!
text.ワクワクのライブ、はじまるよー！: The exciting live show is about to begin!
text.“どーじょーやぶり”、\r\nおもしろかったなー。\r\nまたやろーっと！: Dojo-yaburi" was fun! Let's do it again!
text.あ、トレーナー！今日はちゃんと\r\n遅刻しなかったよ♪\r\nわたしの脚、速く: Oh, trainer! I wasn't late today… Maybe my legs are getting faster!
text.あれ？あそこにいるのスペちゃん？\r\nふっしぎー！寮を出るの、\r\nわたしの: Huh? Is that Spee over there? That's so weird! I left the dorm earlier than you did!
text.お昼はいつも、にんじんパンの\r\n“そーだつせん”なんだ！わたしも\r\n今日: Lunch is always "Sodatsusen" with carrot bread! I'll do my best to win today!
text.お昼いっぱい食べたから、\r\nお腹がぱんぱんだよー。\r\nふわぁ～…眠くなっ: I ate a full lunch, so my stomach is full. I'm getting sleepy.
text.えっ？もう晩ごはん？\r\nトレーニングしてると、\r\nすぐ夜になっちゃうね！: What? Dinner is already ready? It's getting late when you're training!
text.にんじんみたいなお星さま、\r\n見つけたんだよ！あとで\r\nトレーナーにも教: I found a star that looks like a carrot! I'll tell my trainer later.
text.みんなでお花見行きたいなー♪\r\nにんじんとお団子、いっぱい\r\n食べるんだ: I want to go cherry blossom viewing with everyone… and eat lots of carrots and dumplings!
text.スイカもにんじんもおいしい\r\nでしょ？一緒に食べたら、\r\nもっとおいしく: Watermelon and carrots are delicious, aren't they? They taste even better together!
text.商店街の八百屋さん、\r\n秋はすっごく忙しくなるんだよ！\r\nお手伝いに行こ: The grocery store in the shopping arcade gets very busy in the fall! Maybe I should go help out?
text.風邪はねー、ひいたことないの！\r\nわたしの体、冬でもぽっかぽか\r\nだから: I've never caught a cold! My body is warm even in winter! I'm fine… ssshhhh!
text.みんなと、ちっちゃいときの話を\r\nしたんだー。わたしは今と\r\nおんなじっ: We talked about when we were little. I was the same as we are now. We were running all the time!
text.オペちゃんがね、笑うと強くなれる\r\nって言ってたの！\r\nはーっはっはっは: Ope-chan told me that laughing makes you stronger! Ha-ha-ha! How about that?
text.えっとね、セイちゃんは具合が\r\n悪いからお休みなんだよ！『サボリ\r\nじゃ: Sei-chan is sick, so she's taking the day off! Pretend I'm not skipping work!
text.今日のテスト、赤点だったんだ～。\r\nけどね、『全部答えてえらいぞ』\r\nっ: I got a red mark on today's test! But, I got a "Hana-Maru" (flower circle) for "answering all the questions well"! Heh heh heh heh!
text.今度、スペちゃんとにんじん\r\nスイーツの食べ放題に行くんだ！\r\nいっぱい: I'm going to an all-you-can-eat carrot and sweet treat with Spee! I'm going to eat a lot!
text.みんなとおんなじ衣装だねっ！\r\nおっそろい、おっそろい♪\r\nみんなとおっ: We're all wearing the same outfit! Same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same, same
text.このお洋服、かわいいよねー。\r\nぴょんぴょんってすると、\r\nふわってなる: These clothes are so cute! When you flip it around, it becomes fluffy.
text.勝負服って動きやすくて大好きー！\r\nあとね、着てると『がんばるぞー』\r\n: I love my competition uniform because it's so easy to move around in! Also, when I wear it, it makes me feel like I'm going to do my best!
text.ウララは元気の子だから、\r\n転んでもへっちゃらだよ！\r\nバンソーコーだっ: Urara is a spirited girl, so she's not afraid of falling down! She even has a bansaucratic routine…
text.一流のラジオ体操って知ってる？\r\nずっとやってればキングちゃんみた\r\nい: Do you know what the best radio calisthenics are? I heard if you do it long enough, you can become like the King! That's great!
text.にんじん畑でお昼寝したらにんじん\r\nたっぷりの夢が見られるかも…！\r\nね: If you take a nap in a carrot field, you might have dreams filled with carrots…! Hey, hey, let's try it!
text.お化けが出たら、\r\nお友だちになりたいなー。\r\nかけっこ競争するんだー！: I want to be friends with the ghosts when they come out. I want to run a race!
text.ぴっかぴかの新入生が\r\nいっぱいだー！\r\nお友だちになりたいなー♪: So many shiny new students! I want to make friends with them!
text.あっつーい！みんなで\r\nにんじんアイス食べに\r\n行こうよー！: It's so hot! Let's all go eat carrot ice cream!
text.紅葉が落ちる前に…キャッチっ！\r\nパン食い競争みたいで\r\nおもしろいよー: Before the leaves fall… catch! It's like a bread-eating contest!
text.みんなと雪合戦もしたいし、\r\nこたつでみかんも食べたいし…\r\nうーん、ど: I want to have a snowball fight with everyone, and I also want to eat mandarin oranges under the kotatsu… Hmmm, which should I choose?
text.いっちに、いっちに！\r\n準備体操はバッチリだよ♪: To match, to match! I'm ready for the exercise… ♪
text.トレーニング？いいよっ。\r\nおやつタイム終わったとこだし！: Training? No problem. Snack time just ended!
text.トレーニングがんばったら\r\nごほうびもらえるんだよね？\r\nよーし、やるぞ: If I work out hard, I get a reward, right? All right, let's do it!
text.何からやるー？\r\nワクワクするトレーニングが\r\nいいなぁー。: Where do I start? I like training that excites me.
text.どんなトレーニングなんだろー？\r\nわくわく、わくわく♪: What kind of training is this? Exciting, exciting ♪
text.トレーニングって楽しいねー。\r\nわたし、強くなってるなーって\r\nわかるも: Training is fun! I can tell I'm getting stronger!
text.前より、いっぱい走れるように\r\nなったんだ！うれしいなっ♪: I can run a lot more than before! I'm so happy!
text.あきらめないで続ければ、\r\n絶対勝てるもん！\r\nもっとトレーニングするぞ: If you keep going and don't give up, you'll win! I'm going to train harder!
text.今なら誰にも負けないぞ～♪ね、トレーナー！: I'm not going to let anyone beat me now… right, trainer!
text.もっともーっと楽しくなるね♪: It's going to be a lot more fun.
text.いけるいけるっ♪: I can do it, I can do it, I can do it…
text.わあ！ハイスコア更新だってー！: Wow! They broke the high score!
text.力がバーンって溢れそう！: It's going to be a powerhouse!
text.やったぁ！いっぱいとれたよ～！: We did it! I got a lot!
text.えへへ、とれてよかった～。: Hehe, I'm glad I got it!
text.わぁ…！やったやったやった！1着！: Wow…! I did it, I did it, I did it, I did it, I did it!
text.出走だぁー！: Let's get out of the race!
text.やった！ログインボーナスだって！: Yes! They said it's a log-in bonus!
text.トレーナーだ～！\r\nなになに、トレーニング！？: It's the trainer! What, what, training!
text.どんなレースでも\r\n1着になっちゃうよー！: I'll be first in any race!
text.ウマ娘めいかん？\r\nが、レベルアップだって！: horsegirl Meikan? is going up a level!
text.頼ってもらえるようにがんばるー！: I'll do my best to make you depend on me!
text.えへへ、制服、似合ってるかなー？: Ehehe, does the uniform look good on me?
text.みんなとおそろいなの、うれしい！: I'm so glad we're all matching!
text.ダンスもいーっぱい練習しなきゃ！: I need to practice my dance moves a lot!
text.ジャジャーン！これが1番の勝負服！: Ta-da! That's the number one outfit!
text.この衣装で、1着になっちゃうよー！: With this outfit, I'll be wearing one!
text.ぜぇ～ったい1着とっちゃうもんね！: I'm totally going to get one!
text.あのね！起きたら髪がばさーって、\r\n門松みたいになってたのっ！\r\nツンツ: You know what? When I woke up, my hair was like a kadomatsu (a traditional Japanese dolphin-shaped pine tree)! It was so tousled and funny!
text.まんまる～！…えへへっ！\r\n朝ごはんの目玉焼きのマネだよ！\r\n日の出みた: Round and round～! …Heh heh heh! I'm copying the fried eggs for breakfast! It was like a sunrise!
text.すっごいこと思いついちゃった！\r\n毎日お昼をおせちにしたら、いつも\r\nみ: I have a great idea! If we have osechi for lunch every day, we can always have a "dairan" with everyone!
text.ねえねえ、お昼きゅーけーしよ～。\r\nいろいろ持ってきたよ！双六と凧と\r\n: Hey, hey, let's have lunch! I've brought all kinds of things! Sugoroku, kites, and… oh, I recommend… karuta!
text.お外暗くなったね～…あ！\r\n凧あげしてきていい！？\r\n凧さんに星を見せて: It's getting dark outside… Can I go fly a kite! I'm going to show Ms. Kite the stars!
text.寝たくなったらお手伝いするよっ！\r\nゴーンゴーンって108回唱えると\r\n: If you want to sleep, I'll help you! Fukuchan said it's good to chant "Gong, Gong, Gong" 108 times!
text.にんじんや～春もにんじん～\r\nにんじんだ～…えへへ！お歌で\r\nあいさつっ: Carrot ya～ spring is carrot too～ carrot da～…ehehe! I wonder if this is what it's like to say hello to someone with a song!
text.あつーい！今凧あげしたら、凧さん\r\nこんがり日焼けしちゃうね！\r\n日焼け: It's so hot! If I fly a kite now, the kite will get a sunburn! I'll put some sunscreen on her!
text.栗拾いにいこーよー！\r\nおっきいのたーっくさん見つけて、\r\nおせちの栗き: Let's go pick chestnuts! We'll find lots of big ones and make chestnut kurikinton for Osechi!
text.ママが、お着物にあうマフラーを\r\n送ってくれたんだって！どんなの\r\nかな: Mom sent me a scarf to match my kimono! I wonder what it will look like? I'm so excited!
text.いくよー、オペちゃんが\r\n考えた最強着物ポーズ！\r\n…ばらのよーに、かれ: Here we go, Ope-chan's idea of the best kimono pose! …Like a rose, pretty!
text.キングちゃんの手は魔法の手なの！\r\nだってね、髪をくるくるぽん！って\r\n: King, your hands are magic hands! She ties my hair up so beautifully! And she ties my hair up so beautifully!
text.ふーふー、ふーふー…よーし！\r\n初詣で甘酒を飲む練習、カンペキ！\r\n次は: Woo hoo, hoo hoo… yay! Practice drinking amazake at Hatsumode, perfect! I won't get burned next time!
text.ねぇねぇ！“ゆず”育てよーよ！\r\nこっちでもお正月にみんなに\r\n配りたい: Hey, hey! Let's grow yuzu! We want to give them out for New Year's over here too!
text.ぽち袋ってわくわくしちゃうね！\r\n何が入ってるかな～って。\r\nにんじんチ: Pochibukuro are so exciting! I wonder what's in the bag. I hope it's carrot chips!
text.たすきで背筋ピーンってするの！\r\nピンピーン！: I'm going to use the tasuki to pinch my back! Pin peen!
text.このお着物でグルグルって回ると、\r\nコマみたいに見えるんだよ！\r\nおめめ: When I spin around in this kimono, it looks like a coma! And her eyes go round and round together, too!
text.今日の目標、お習字してきたの！\r\n『学園のみーんなにあいさつする』\r\nっ: Today's goal, I learned to write! "Greet everyone at the school!" Okay, I'll do my best!
text.国語の時間にね、フクちゃんと\r\n覚えた歌が出たの！先生が『よく\r\n知って: In Japanese class, there was a song that Fuchi-chan and I learned! The teacher said, "You knew it well!" Oh, my God!
text.明日ね！早起きして、日の出見て、\r\nトレーナーのとこ行くよ！そしたら\r\n: See you tomorrow! I'll get up early, watch the sunrise, and go to the trainer's! Then we can have more fun than usual!
text.しんしゅん、しんしゅーん！\r\nえへへ～！なんか言ってるだけで\r\n速くなれ: Shinshun, shinshun! Ehehe～! Just saying those words makes me feel like I'm getting faster～!
text.このお着物なら、よさこいも\r\n踊れちゃうね！鳴子を持って\r\nチャッチャッ: With this kimono, I can dance Yosakoi! With Naruko in hand, chachachachachachachachachachacho! Ha-ha!
text.う～っ！さつまいもいーっぱい\r\n食べたから、お腹パンパン…\r\nのびーる袴: Ugh! I've eaten so many sweet potatoes, my stomach is so full… I wonder if there are any hakama that can be stretched…?
text.ええー！？エキデンって、タヌキ\r\nじゃなくてタスキを持って走るの？\r\nド: What? Ekiden run with a tusk instead of a raccoon dog? I'll have to teach Dotou-chan that!
text.今年のわたしは『ひと味違う』よ！\r\nううん、に、さん…うーん！\r\nたくさ: I'm "different" this year! No, two, three… ummm! I'm a lot different!
text.ライスちゃんと羽根つきで\r\nたーくさん遊んだんだー！でもね、\r\nまだまだ: Rice and I played a lot with shuttlecocks! But, she's still full of energy!
text.ねえねえ！練習どれにしよう～って\r\nなったら、おみくじで決めるの\r\nどう: Hey, hey! When you're deciding which one to practice, how about deciding by fortunes? It'll be fun!
text.お参りのときね、神さまに約束\r\nしたの！たーくさん、元気よく\r\n走ります: When I visited the shrine, I made a promise to God! I'll run a lot, and I'll run well! Watch over me!
text.そうだ！トレーナーのお顔で\r\n福笑い作ったんだ～っ！\r\nあとで遊ぼーね！: That's right! I made a happy laugh out of my trainer's face! Let's play later!
text.今年の年賀状、トレーナーに\r\nたーくさん『ありがとう』って\r\n書くね！は: I'll write lots of "Thank yous" to my trainer on this year's New Year's card! I'll write a lot of "Thank yous" to my trainer this New Year's card!
text.今度のお正月、トレーナーも\r\n高知においでよ！1番キレイに\r\n初日の出が: Come to Kochi next New Year's, trainer! I'll show you where you can see the most beautiful first sunrise of the year!
text.来年も、ずぅーっと先も！\r\n一緒にうっらら～♪しよ！: Next year and for a long time to come! Let's do it together!
text.おもちみたいに\r\nぷくーっと成長できたよ！: I could grow up to be as puffy as a rice cake!
text.わぁーい！おもちもたくさんつけちゃうね！: Wow! I'm going to put on a lot of mochi!
text.凧あげみたいに\r\nぐんぐんぐーんっ！: We're moving up through the air like a kite!
text.えっへん、かっこいいでしょー！\r\nトレーナーもお揃いで着ようよ！: Ahem, isn't it cool! Let's wear matching sweatshirts too!
text.明けまして、うっらら～♪\r\nわくわくな年にしようね！: Happy New Year, Ullala～♪ Let's make it an exciting year!
text.まっかせて～！う～ん…わわわっ！えーい！\r\nあちゃちゃ！…でも大丈夫！ずーっ: Let me wait for you～! Uhhh… wow! Aaahhh! Aaahhh! But it's okay! I'm excited all the time… right!
text.勝ったらお筆で書くんだよねっ！\r\n勝利の～…ハナマルだぁっ！: If I win, I'm going to write it with a brush! It's the victory～…Hanamaru!
text.ウマ娘かるただってー！\r\nよーし、がんばって\r\n練習するぞー！: They're playing horsegirl karuta! Okay, I'm going to practice hard!
text.やったー、とれたー！\r\n春とうららが入ってるから、\r\nこの歌は覚えてたん: Yay, I got it! I knew I remembered this song because it has "Spring and Hurrah" in it!
text.イベントミッションだってー！\r\nねえねえ、わたしと勝負する？: It's an event mission! Hey, hey, hey, do you want to play with me?
text.イベント、おつかれさまー！\r\nほうしゅう全部受けとった？\r\nわたしも運ぶ: Good luck at the event! Did you receive all of the brochures? I'll help you carry them!
text.わたし、ビューティードリーム\r\nカップで、ライスちゃんたち\r\nみんなと走: I want to run with all the Rice girls in the Beauty Dream Cup.
text.ビューティーさんの勝負服と\r\n一緒に走って、ぜったい\r\n1着とっちゃうよ: I'm going to run with Beauty's outfit and win first place for sure!
